content: the cooler side of warm designed by melissa clulow the cooler side of warm melissa clulow finished measurements height 17 5 circumference at widest point measured within first stockinette section - 24 circumference at top of stockinette section just before ribbing approx 21 yarn 3 skeins of woolfolk får 100% merino 130 m / 142 y we used colour 20 needles 4 5 mm us8 16 circular needles 5 0 mm us8 16 circular needles or size needed to obtain gauge gauge 20 sts in 4 / 10 cm row gauge not essential in stockinette on larger needles notes both the bottom ribbing and middle stockinette sections are knit with the same size needles smaller needles are used for the ribbing at top of cowl if desired needles with a longer cord e g 24 can be used to begin the cowl which is started flat before switching to shorter needles and closing to knit in the round 2 the cooler side of warm pattern cast on 121 sts with larger needles work flat in 1x1 rib for 4 next round switch to stockinette knit to last 2 sts k2tog 120 sts place marker for beginning of round knit 60 sts place second marker knit to end of round knit 3 5 next round decrease round k1 k2tog knit to 3 sts before marker ssk k1 repeat brackets once 116 sts knit 2 repeat decrease round 112 sts knit 2 repeat decrease round 108 sts knit 2 repeat decrease round 104 sts after last decrease round switch to smaller needles and work 1x1 rib for 4 bind off loosely in pattern add a little edge to your cowl with a latch leather closure from jul designs if desired happy knitting montreal quebec 514 486 5648 www espacetricot com 3 the cooler side of warm
